alert.note: Alert for Alamance; Chatham; Guilford; Orange; Randolph (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 22 at 9:29AM EDT until April 22 at 10:15AM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Alamance County in central North Carolina... Western Orange County in central North Carolina... Eastern Randolph County in central North Carolina... Eastern Guilford County in central North Carolina... Western Chatham County in central North Carolina... * Until 1015 AM EDT. * At 928 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Monroeton to Randleman to near Biscoe, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Greensboro, Burlington, Asheboro, Graham, Randleman, Siler City, North Carolina Zoo, Mebane, Seagrove and Elon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
